ygData.subject: Re: FW: [shadowknight] Re: re to latest stuffs :)
ygData.msgSnippet: If you kill enough of a certain critter you can into cities.  As a dark elf i can now safely walk into Freeport....some people will still KoS me if I walk into
ygData.messageBody:
If you kill enough of a certain critter you can into cities. As a dark
elf i can now safely walk into Freeport....some people will still KoS me
if I walk into the wrong building...but you can walk around the streets
with relative safety. Just don't talk to anyone. Last time I was in
Freeport the guards "/con"ed dubiously...so i was alright....I have killed
ALOT more Orcs since then so I'm not sure if my status went up.

Korm
Cazic Thule
